fields.data:
Generic Range properties:
⦿help - explain input pattern and purpose. can be displayed on ❔ button click
⦿default - value on initial display (mandatory here)
⦿onlyRangeEnable - disable name label
⦿required - when set to true, input must be provided
⦿restrictions - provide min or/and max values to restrict user input
fields.name: info_msg_generic_range_options

fields.help: Count of range fields will depend on count of object inside default
fields.name: generic_range_mandatory
fields.validationDescription: Only alphabet, numeric, '.', '_', ' ' and '-' are allowed

fields.name: generic_range_json
